typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct Staking.User storage ref))
struct Staking.Pool storage ref[] storage ref
struct Staking.Pool storage ref[] storage ref

params._poolId: index of the pool in the Pool[] array Emit a Claimed event Requirements: - `_poolId` must exists in the Pool[] array - `msg.sender` must have rewards to claim for

params._rewardPerBlock: how much _tokenReward will be distributed per block
params._rewardTokenDataFeedAddress: chainlink datafeed address to get the price of the _tokenReward Emit a PoolCreated event Requirements: - `msg.sender` must be the owner - `_tokenToStake` must be a valid address - `_tokenReward` must be a valid address - `_rewardTokenDataFeedAddress` must be a valid address - `_rewardPerBlock` must be greater than zero

deposit(uint256,uint256).details: Deposit some token in the pool _poolId and update the rewards calculation

params._amount: Number of token user want to deposit in the pool Emit a Staked event Requirements: - `_poolId` must exists in the Pool[] array - `_amount` must be greater than zero - `msg.sender` must own enough token to deposit
params._poolId: index of the pool in the Pool[] array

getPoolBalance(uint256).details: Return the total balance of the pool _poolId

params._poolId: index of the pool in the Pool[] array Requirements: - `_poolId` must exists in the Pool[] array

getRewardToClaim(uint256).details: Return the number of claimable tokens from the pool _poolId

params._poolId: index of the pool in the Pool[] array Requirements: - `_poolId` must exists in the Pool[] array

getUserBalance(uint256,address).details: Return the user balance of deposited token in the pool _poolId

params._address: user address Requirements: - `_poolId` must exists in the Pool[] array
params._poolId: index of the pool in the Pool[] array

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: Withdraw some token from the pool _poolId, update the rewards calculation and claim reward if possible

params._amount: Number of token user want to withdraw from the pool Emit a Withdrawn event Requirements: - `_poolId` must exists in the Pool[] array - `_amount` must be greater than zero - `msg.sender` must have enough token in this pool
params._poolId: index of the pool in the Pool[] array

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit some tokens in a pool

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw some tokens from the pool
